questions.question: What is the significance of the lifelines of the national economy?
options: They are essential for the transportation of goods.
They help in the communication between different regions.
They contribute to the overall economic development.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT considered a lifeline of the national economy?
How do lifelines impact trade?
options: They facilitate faster movement of goods.
They increase the cost of transportation.
They have no impact on trade.
questions.answer: They facilitate faster movement of goods.
